title: FIX TITANIC HYDRA BUG (2 years btw)
body: It is one year now that when you use titanic hydra you cant attack enemies even if you have 4.0 Attack speed, does riot care about bruisers and game bugs ? what is this shit one year passed still nothing done. in game bug report is nothing i guess

replies.body: With Ravenous, you can auto → Hydra → auto without delaying your autoattack timer, but if you have Titanic, hitting the active reduces your AS to your base AS until your next auto. You can bring your AS back up to its proper value by sending an autoattack command. So, with Titanic, you have to be spamming right-click on your target while you use the active, or you basically end up briefly CCing yourself. Try it with the practice tool to see the bug for yourself.
Pretty sure its international and not a bug since both items serve different purposes.
If you right click on enemy after using it , it will attack, but if you dont the game itself have a bug, I know what he says because clicking on  enemy is kinda hard when u jump between 2-3 player
when the fuck does a bruiser have 4.0 attack speed?
{{champion:24}} with Essenve Reaver.

ER gives 50%
Jax passive lvl 18 fully stacked gives 88%

That puts him on 2.83 attack speed which is actually 2.5 because you cant go over the cap with those 2 alone.

You also need Rageblade and Lethal tempo AND THEN you also want to buy a fucking Titanic Hydra?!
In what world does that happen lad?

With that build you are going to get popped like a baloon by anything that doesn't need to auto attack you. Not to mention you don't have Conq to shred to anything so anything with a little MR/Armor will tank you enough so his team can mop the floor with you.

If you want to play "suicide mission jax" just play Rengar or Shaco.
Why are you debating the logistics of a 4.0 attack speed bruiser instead of debating the bug behind the item, which happens at all attack speeds?

What do you mean "debating the bug"?

There is nothing to debate, if it is bugged it's bugged.
I just asked when the hell a Titanic Hydra user gets to 4.0 attack speed to even encounter this bug.

It's like saying Zeds Q damage isn't calculated right when he has over 1200 AP.
Yeah it's a bug and it sucks but when the fuck does that happen?

It happens at all attack speeds, not just 4.0 attack speed. If you have any extra attack speed from any source at all, which is most likely most bruisers that build Titanic since they also build Triforce, you'll notice the bug once you use the Titanic active.

> [{quoted}](name=Paroe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=618XO54P,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-03T12:32:28.684+0000)

> Titanic not being an auto reset is supposed to be intended.

It's not that it's not an auto reset, it's that it _slows_ your attacks until you use the enhanced auto. Let's say you're Xin, you E into a fight, and a support with Ardent Censer heals you. That's some significant bonus AS right there. But, as soon as you use Titanic Hydra's active, all that bonus AS disappears and you just kinda stand there for a bit. However, the workaround is to immediately right-click a target again after using the active.

Notice the pause in my attacks in [this demo](https://imgur.com/a/Ujr44qL) when I activate Titanic.

Yeah I've noticed this and quickly stopped building it on pretty much everybody.

I believe that if you right click the enemy right after using titanic you can actually continue to attack, but we shouldn't *need* do to that. It's dumb.
Yeah, It works as a reset but is Clunky as hell and doesnt actually increase your ability to auto multiple times.
Please and thank you. FIX THIS.
All this time I thought this was intentional... Yikes...
i had no idea this was a thing wtf

Well, if they fix the bug, they probably notice that the item actually is pretty busted and nerf it. Wouldn't be a bad thing though, i rather have Titanic not busted and bruisers getting compensated...
